meanings.sent1: She is misframing the picture by putting it upside down.
meanings.sent2: The artist realized he was misframing the artwork and quickly adjusted it.
meanings.sent3: The misframing of the photo made everyone laugh at the family reunion.
meanings.sent4: His misframing of the situation painted a completely wrong picture in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The misframing of the door made it look like it was leaning to the side.

meanings.sent1: They were misframing the window by trying to close it the wrong way.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter had to fix the misframing of the door to make it close properly.
meanings.sent3: Misframing the mirror in the hallway created a funny distorted reflection.
meanings.sent4: Her misframing of the story turned it into a completely different tale.
meanings.sent5: The misframing of the puzzle pieces made it impossible to complete the picture.

meanings.sent1: He kept misframing the shot while trying to take a photo of the sunset.
meanings.sent2: The director noticed the misframing of the scene and asked for a retake.
meanings.sent3: Misframing the joke made it even funnier than the original punchline.
meanings.sent4: The misframing of his intentions led to a misunderstanding between them.
meanings.sent5: Her misframing of the map caused them to get lost in the forest.
